DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation safety efficacy Carl Zeiss Meditec VisuMax femtosecond laser lamellar resection ( ReLEx smile ) reduction myopia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety ReLEx Smile Laser Correction Myopia
DOC.detailed_description: Quality control study patient treat ReLEx smile myopia Department Ophthalmology , Aarhus University Hospital . The patient follow standard clinical technique ( slit-lamp examination , refraction , topography ) normal follow-up 12 month treatment .
DOC.criteria: Indication keratorefractive correction myopia Patient consent undergo keratorefractive correction myopia Pregnant lactating woman
